T02D2843:182b-0: @182b * // bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po gzi brjid kun nas 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2843:182b-1: dal ba don yod dus las 'das pa dang //
T02D2843:182b-2: sdig mang ngan 'gro'i sgor zhugs de bzhin du //
T02D2843:182b-3: yang bar ma nying mtshams sbyar ba'i tshe //
T02D2843:182b-4: de rten cho ga rgyal pos rnam par sbyang //
T02D2843:182b-5: slob dpon shin tu snying brtse can //
T02D2843:182b-6: rig pa rgya mtsho pha rol son //
T02D2843:182b-7: brtan zhing mi 'phrogs mkhas pa yis //
T02D2843:182b-8: dbugs bral slob ma mdun du gzhag / chus bkrus dris byugs rgyan btags te //
T02D2843:182b-9: brdeg dang bkru sogs cho ga bzhin //
T02D2843:182b-10: de nas sngags bcas bdug pa yis //
T02D2843:182b-11: bgegs bskrad 'khor lo bcings nas ni //
T02D2843:182b-12: spyi gtsug bla ma yab dang yum //
T02D2843:182b-13: snyoms zhugs thig le ma lhung ba //
T02D2843:182b-14: goms pa'i lha rten mdun gnas kyi //
T02D2843:182b-15: shangs bug nas ni myur bsdus zhes //
T02D2843:182b-16: de yi thugs dkyil padmo bsgom //
T02D2843:182b-17: rdo rje'i rgyas btab zum pa'i nang //
T02D2843:182b-19: slar byung zhing mchog de sras gyur //
T02D2843:182b-20: dogs su mthar phyin gru 'dra yis //
T02D2843:182b-21: phung po ma dag dag pa dang //
T02D2843:183a-1: pa dri med bsreg rdzas su //
T02D2843:183a-2: byin gyis brlabs la rtog bral mchod //
T02D2843:183a-3: sngags chu dri ldan yungs kar dang //
T02D2843:183a-4: ral gri la sogs mtshon brdar phye //
T02D2843:183a-5: mar dang til sbyar blug cing bsreg / me lce
T02D2843:183a-6: 'bar ba'i ltas rnams brtag / gson tshe goms par
T02D2843:183a-7: byas pa yis // 'bras bu de ring dus yin gyi //
T02D2843:183a-8: bu khyod 'khrug par ma byed par //
T02D2843:183a-9: brtan par rnal 'byor dran par gyis //
T02D2843:183a-10: khyod kyi lus kyi grong khyer ni //
T02D2843:183a-11: rten 'di yin te de yi thugs //
T02D2843:183a-12: bu khyod sems dang gnyis med nyid //
T02D2843:183a-13: khyod kyi rtag gnas 'di yin te //
T02D2843:183a-14: yongs dag zhing ni rtag pa'i yul //
T02D2843:183a-17: gang yang gnas dang lus 'di dang //
T02D2843:183a-18: spyod yul 'di la nyes dmigs dang //
T02D2843:183a-19: yongs dag zhing dang rten dang ni //
T02D2843:183a-20: spyod yul mchog brjod nges par bya //
T02D2843:183a-22: sdig dang dge legs skyon yon mang //
T02D2843:183a-23: sngags mtshams ngal bus rnyed nas su //
T02D2843:183a-24: skyo dang spro bas dbugs dbyung ngo //
T02D2843:183a-25: de rjes gtor ma bzang byin la //
T02D2843:183a-26: bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam btab //
T02D2843:183a-27: dam tshig 'dzin pa'i sngags bzla zhing //
T02D2843:183a-28: rus pa bsdus la mchod rten bsgrub //
